column5: On the news today was mention of a dog food recall, here is an article I found on it  http://www.canada.com/topics/news/national...a92&k=57374  I know two of the companies affected are Eukanuba and Iams.  Maureen
Thank you for the heads up Maureen...Thankfully  I dont have either brand.
If I understand it correctly, that company provides products to 17 of the 20 brands out there, anyone know which brands are not affected?
Oh, darn it, those were my favorite, now what am I gonna have for dinner  Joey
I just did a quick search and the affected products are wet canned food and pouched snacks.
Sad when you think your buying good food  for your pets.  Thanks for the heads up.
More info can be found here http://www.menufoods.com/recall/index.html they will release all the companies affected after 6:00 am  Maureen
Good thing I don't see Iams in there, both my cat and dog eat the good stuff. ( supposedly )
It was in the paper here today also, wal-mart brand was mentioned too.

i boycott IAMS,i once read somewhere(i think it may have been here a long time ago) that IAMS was a major supporter/financer of P3TA, my jack russell eats dry pedigree and every once in awhile gets a little container of caesar's wet,
